attributes.action: keep the once a week collection
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to keep the weekly bin collection in the country because if we lose it won't we make more co2 by going to the tip each week if the collection gose to every 2 weeks ,which if it happens there will be an increase in rodents. also by having the once a week bin collection there will be less cars going to the tip as one lorry will take the place of 5 cars
